original_text: This is what happened when we dedicated the wall of Jerusalem to God. The people told the Levites to come to Jerusalem from the places where they lived. They wanted the Levites to help them to praise God with joy. The Levites would sing songs to thank God. They would make music with cymbals, harps and lyres. 12: To dedicate something means that you are giving it to God, so that he will bless it. This is what happened when we dedicated the wall of Jerusalem to God. The people told the Levites to come to Jerusalem from the places where they lived. They wanted the Levites to help them to praise God with joy. The Levites would sing songs to thank God. They would make music with cymbals, harps and lyres.
korean_text: 예루살렘 성벽을 봉헌하게 되니 각처에서 레위 사람들을 찾아 예루살렘으로 데려다가 감사하며 노래하며 제금을 치며 비파와 수금을 타며 즐거이 봉헌식을 행하려 하매

sentences.original_text: when we dedicated the wall of Jerusalem to God
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 예루살렘의 성벽을 하나님께 바쳤을 때

sentences.original_text: The people told the Levites to come to Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 레위 사람들에게 예루살렘에 오라고 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: from the places where they lived
They wanted the Levites to help them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 레위 사람들이 그들을 돕기를 원했습니다

sentences.original_text: The Levites would sing songs to thank God
sentences.korean_translation: 레위 사람들은 하나님께 감사하기 위해 노래할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They would make music with cymbals, harps and lyres
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 꽹과리, 수금과 비파로 음악을 만들 것입니다

sentences.original_text: To dedicate something means that you are giving it to God
sentences.korean_translation: 무언가를 바친다는 것은 그것을 하나님께 드리는 것을 의미합니다

sentences.original_text: so that he will bless it
when we dedicated the wall of Jerusalem to God
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 예루살렘의 성벽을 하나님께 바쳤을 때

sentences.original_text: The people told the Levites to come to Jerusalem
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 레위 사람들에게 예루살렘에 오라고 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: from the places where they lived
They wanted the Levites to help them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 레위 사람들이 그들을 돕기를 원했습니다

sentences.original_text: The Levites would sing songs to thank God
sentences.korean_translation: 레위 사람들은 하나님께 감사하기 위해 노래할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They would make music with cymbals, harps and lyres
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 꽹과리, 수금과 비파로 음악을 만들 것입니다
